value.title: AI and machine learning influence becomes more apparent with latest analytics releases by AWS
value.excerpt: One of the messages coming from nearly two weeks of announcements as part of Amazon Web Services Inc.’s re:Invent conference is that artificial intelligence and machine learning are ready to abstract away a lot of manual work involved in moving data around the enterprise IT infrastructure.

value.title: AWS and NVIDIA achieve the fastest training times for Mask R-CNN and T5-3B
value.excerpt: Note: At the AWS re:Invent Machine Learning Keynote we announced performance records for T5-3B and Mask-RCNN. This blog post includes updated numbers with additional optimizations since the keynote aired live on 12/8. At re:Invent 2019, we demonstrated the fastest training times on the cloud for Mask

value.title: Making sense of your health data with Amazon HealthLake
value.excerpt: We’re excited to announce Amazon HealthLake, a new HIPAA-eligible service for healthcare providers, health insurance companies, and pharmaceutical companies to securely store, transform, query, analyze, and share health data in the cloud, at petabyte scale. HealthLake uses machine learning (ML) models

value.title: Q&A: AWS looks to support healthcare startups through tailored acceleration initiatives
value.excerpt: Over the past year alone, Amazon has provided more than a billion dollars in credits through AWS Activate program to help startups grow and scale their businesses, and they are launching a new program called AWS Health Accelerator to address the specific needs of healthcare startups.

value.title: Amazon Forecast Weather Index – automatically include local weather to increase your forecasting model accuracy
value.excerpt: We’re excited to announce the Amazon Forecast Weather Index, which can increase your forecasting accuracy by automatically including local weather information in your demand forecasts with one click and at no extra cost. Weather conditions influence consumer demand patterns, product merchandizing decisions,

value.title: Amazon unveils dozens of machine learning tools
value.excerpt: Invent, the company announced new capabilities for Amazon SageMaker, the general availability of Amazon Neptune ML, and more.

value.title: AWS expands on SageMaker capabilities with end-to-end features for machine learning
value.excerpt: Nearly three years after it was first launched, Amazon Web Services’ SageMaker platform has gotten a significant upgrade in the form of new features, making it easier for developers to automate and scale each step of the process to build new automation and machine learning capabilities,

value.title: Speeding up TensorFlow, MXNet, and PyTorch inference with Amazon SageMaker Neo
value.excerpt: Various machine learning (ML) optimizations are possible at every stage of the flow during or after training. value.title: Amazon AWS unveils RedShift ML to 'bring machine learning to more builders'
value.excerpt: Amazon VP of machine learning Swami Sivasubramanian said AI is having its AWS moment, a period of democratizing the technology by "bringing ML to more builders."

value.title: Amazon Web Services launches new tool to detect bias and blind spots in machine learning
value.excerpt: A new feature from Amazon Web Services will alert developers to potential bias in machine learning algorithms, part of a larger effort by the tech industry to keep automated predictions

value.title: AWS leverages Gaudi AI processor to reduce cost of deep learning models
value.excerpt: As the use of machine learning grows and gains complexity, the cost and time of training models can be challenging for enterprises. Amazon Web Services Inc. announced that its EC2 will be powered by Gaudi accelerators from Habana Labs,

value.title: Predicting soccer goals in near real time using computer vision
value.excerpt: In a soccer game, fans get excited seeing a player sprint down the sideline during a counterattack or when a team is controlling the ball in the 18-yard box because those actions could lead to goals. However, it is difficult for human eyes to fully capture such fast movements, let alone predict goals.

value.title: AWS Announces Nine New Amazon SageMaker Capabilities

value.title: AWS announces SageMaker Clarify to help reduce bias in machine learning models
value.excerpt: As companies rely increasingly on machine learning models to run their businesses, it’s imperative to include anti-bias measures to ensure these models are not making false or misleading assumptions.

value.title: Getting started with the Amazon Kendra Google Drive connector
value.excerpt: Amazon Kendra is a highly accurate and easy-to-use intelligent search service powered by machine learning (ML). To simplify the process of connecting data sources to your index, Amazon Kendra offers several native data source connectors to help get your documents easily ingested. For many organizations,

value.title: ViacomCBS Taps AWS as Cloud Provider for Broadcast Operations
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services and ViacomCBS have announced a strategic partnership that will see AWS become the cloud provider for ViacomCBS’ global broadcast media operations. This deal will see the migration of ViacomCBS’ 425 linear TV channels and 40 global data and media centers to the AWS cloud.

value.title: Thomson Reuters Taps AWS to Power Digital Transformation

value.title: Amazon (AMZN) AWS Teams Up With MGM, Bolsters Cloud Clientele
value.excerpt: Amazon’s AMZN cloud computing arm — Amazon Web Services (“AWS”) — entered a multi-year agreement with Metro Goldwyn Mayer (“MGM”). As part of the latest collaboration, MGM is shifting library and critical SAP workloads to AWS to make advancements in its core media supply chain and enterprise-wide media distribution platform.

value.title: BMW develops AI-powered big data hub with AWS to boost manufacturing efficiency
value.excerpt: BMW has developed a data hub with Amazon’s cloud computing division, in a sign of how companies are using “big data” to boost efficiency.

value.title: MGM leverages AWS for its supply chain
value.excerpt: Film studio MGM has reached a multi-year deal with Amazon Web Services to power its media supply chain with AWS cloud technology to help distribute its TV and film content across multiple platforms. The new MGM media supply chain will use AWS compute,

value.title: AWS Announces Plans to Open Second Region in Australia

value.title: How AWS aims to democratize machine learning with cloud services
value.excerpt: Swami Sivasubramanian, vice president of Amazon AI, will hold the first-ever re:Invent keynote on the topic, a clear sign that AWS views AI and machine learning as an area ripe for reinvention. AWS Chief Executive Andy Jassy (pictured) told me that the company’s overall aim is to enable machine learning to be embedded into most applications before the decade is out by making it accessible to more than just experts.

value.title: AWS Expands Think Big, ATO, AI/ML Rapid Adoption Programs
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services is ramping up offerings for its public sector partners with the expansion of its Think Big for Small Business, AI/ML Rapid Adoption and Authority to Operate on AWS programs

value.title: AWS Cloud Tech to Power MGM Media Supply Chain
value.excerpt: SEATTLE—Amazon Web Services has reached a multi-year deal with Metro Goldwyn Mayer (MGM) that will power MGM’s media supply chain with AWS cloud technology to help distribute its TV and film content across multiple platforms.
